title: Drawing, "Four Statues in Niches: Music, Architecture, Painting, and Sculpture; Study of Bacchus and Mercury", 1816
title_raw: Four Statues in Niches: Music, Architecture, Painting, and Sculpture; Study of Bacchus and Mercury
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper

description: Study of four statues in niches: music, architecture, painting and sculpture. Study of Bacchus with Hermes.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Four Statues in Niches: Music, Architecture, Painting, and Sculpture; Study of Bacchus and Mercury", 1816. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3428.
